title: Art Party from Michael Art
body:
We invite you to spend with us the brightest and most exclusive event of this year from the Michael Art studio.

When? April 6 at 17:00
Where? Restaurant Granada
Address: Kabanbay Batyr str. 49

Sign up on Instagram or at ticket sites. Cost: 19,000 tenge

title: Iftar Menu
body:
We invite you to spend iftar in our restaurant, where you will find delicious food and a cozy atmosphere.

When? Every day during Ramadan
Where? Restaurant Granada
Address: Kabanbay Batyr str. 49
